DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult age 20 pregnant woman . 2 . Clear consciousness , without severe cognitive impairment , dementia , mental retardation mental illness . 3 . Literacy use Chinese Taiwanese . 4 . Willingness participate research . Refused participate research
